long_description: Keep tabs on your environment with the Garmin tempe(TM) Wireless Temperature Sensor; the information gets sent to a compatible device so you can stay updated during all your outdoor adventures. Sensor attaches wirelessly to a backpack, shoe or clothing item. Compatible Garmin devices receive temperature readings.
short_description: Keep tabs on your environment with the Garmin tempe(TM) Wireless Temperature Sensor; the information gets sent to a compatible device so you can stay updated during all your outdoor adventures.
